description:
The Ticketmaster app makes it easier to buy, sell, and get into the very best of live entertainment - so you can get on with making memories that last.

We give you unparalleled access to thousands of venues, artists, theatre and sports events.

DISCOVER
- Explore millions of events from concerts, festivals and theatre to sport and comedy shows
- Get real-time updates about your favourite artists, events, and venues
- Take control of your experience by browsing available seats and selecting those that best match your preferences

BUY 
- Buy your tickets simply and safely 
- Credit Card, Gift Cards, instalments and more - Choose the payment option that works best for you 

SELL
- Safely and securely resell your tickets to fellow fans if you can’t go
- Set your price for your tickets, and if they sell, you'll be paid through your selected payment method

GET INTO THE SHOW
- No need to worry about printing tickets! Access your tickets and all event details directly from your app
- Easily transfer your tickets to family and friends before the show giving everyone the freedom to enter when they want 

Download the Ticketmaster app and go live.

TikTok is THE destination for mobile videos. On TikTok, short-form videos are exciting, spontaneous, and genuine. Whether you’re a sports fanatic, a pet enthusiast, or just looking for a laugh, there’s something for everyone on TikTok. All you have to do is watch, engage with what you like, skip what you don’t, and you’ll find an endless stream of short videos that feel personalized just for you. From your morning coffee to your afternoon errands, TikTok has the videos that are guaranteed to make your day.

We make it easy for you to discover and create your own original videos by providing easy-to-use tools to view and capture your daily moments. Take your videos to the next level with special effects, filters, music, and more. 

■ Watch endless amount of videos customized specifically for you
A personalized video feed based on what you watch, like, and share. TikTok offers you real, interesting, and fun videos that will make your day.
 
■ Explore videos, just one scroll away
Watch all types of videos, from Comedy, Gaming, DIY, Food, Sports, Memes, and Pets, to Oddly Satisfying, ASMR, and everything in between.
 
■ Pause recording multiple times in one video
Pause and resume your video with just a tap. Shoot as many times as you need.
 
■ Be entertained and inspired by a global community of creators
Millions of creators are on TikTok showcasing their incredible skills and everyday life. Let yourself be inspired.

■ Add your favorite music or sound to your videos for free
Easily edit your videos with millions of free music clips and sounds. We curate music and sound playlists for you with the hottest tracks in every genre, including Hip Hop, Edm, Pop, Rock, Rap, and Country, and the most viral original sounds.

■ Express yourself with creative effects
Unlock tons of filters, effects, and AR objects to take your videos to the next level.

■ Edit your own videos 
Our integrated editing tools allow you to easily trim, cut, merge and duplicate video clips without leaving the app.

■ Obtain access to LIVE benefits to better interact with hosts!
Choose from one-month subscription or auto-renewal subscription to enjoy special LIVE benefits (currently only available in limited regions)

Who's the imposter among your friends?
Imposter is the ultimate party game of bluffing, guessing, and social deduction. Grab 3-5 friends, sit around one device, and find out who’s lying.

How to Play:
1- All players see the same secret word—except one.
2- The imposter only sees the word “Imposter.”
3- One by one, players say a word related to the secret word.
4- The imposter must fake it and try to blend in without knowing the word.
5- Keep giving words and talking until someone thinks they've figured it out.

Fun, fast, and full of suspicion—perfect for game nights, road trips, or hanging out with friends.

Features:
- Play locally with 3 to 15 friends
- 10+ categories like food, movies, jobs, and more
- 500+ unique words and growing
- No accounts, no setup—just start playing
- Great for all ages—kids, teens, and adults

Built for laughs, bluffing, and epic "aha!" moments

Download now and start your next Imposter showdown!

https://imposterwho.com/terms
https://imposterwho.com/privacy

If you subscribe to Prime Video via iTunes (where available), payment is charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase and your membership automatically renews monthly unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the then current plan period. Your account is charged for renewal within 24 hours before the end of each plan period at the rate of your selected plan. Manage your subscription and turn off auto-renewal anytime by going to My Account or through iTunes.

Looking for the most talked about TV shows and movies from around the world? They’re all on Netflix.

We’ve got award-winning series, movies, documentaries and stand-up specials. And with the mobile app, you get Netflix while you travel, commute or just take a break.

What you’ll love about Netflix:
• We add TV shows and movies all the time. Browse new titles or search for your favourites, and stream videos right on your device.
• The more you watch, the better Netflix gets at recommending TV shows and movies you’ll love.
• Enjoy a safe watching experience just for kids with family-friendly entertainment.
• Preview quick videos of our series and movies and get notifications for new episodes and releases.

Netflix membership is a month-to-month subscription that begins at sign up. You can easily cancel at any time, online, 24 hours a day. There are no long-term contracts or cancellation fees. We just want you to love what you watch.

Tired of never finishing a movie or paying for unused subscriptions? 

Watch ReelShort — Every Second is Drama

Say hello to ReelShort, a next-gen HD streaming short movie platform offering exclusive vertical TV mini series. Recognized by Times100 for our movie reels innovation in the entertainment industry, we're changing the way you watch movies with our one-minute short movie episodes that you can enjoy anytime, anywhere, all from the convenience of your phone with the ReelShort App.

Choose from our TV mini series library packed with endless addictive movie shorts added daily, from romantic encounters with billionaires and heart-wrenching tragedies to epic comeback stories and more—you won't ever be short on short movie entertainment!

Featured Shows:
[Don't Miss Me When I'm Gone] After losing my parents, I move in with my godmother, Aunt Sandra. I live under her roof with her two sons-the Miller brothers-surrounded by love and care. I think I’ll end up with one of them. But everything changes when the maid’s daughter, Lola, moves in. The Miller brother I love most breaks my heart into pieces. After I leave, they lose their minds trying to find me.

[Move Aside! I'm the Final Boss] Kingsley is the secret King of King's Corps and the richest man on Earth, but when he returns from the battlefield, his childhood sweetheart brutally dumps him, thinking he's a clown. How will the King of all men make her regret it?

Here's why you'll love ReelShort:

Bite-sized original movie shorts designed for on-the-go viewing
•Exclusive short movies with juicy vertical content that will keep you hooked
•New TV mini series added daily, with hundreds of new episodes each month
•Hollywood-quality entertainment, crafted for the big screen delivered to your small screen
•The first ever interactive live action short movies, where you decide what happens next
Experience the future of short movie entertainment, one minute at a time — download ReelShort now!

The official Lotto NZ app. The easy way to play all our games

Be in to win in just a few taps with the official MyLotto app, the easy way to play Lotto NZ games on the go. Just grab your ticket online, play your favourite numbers and watch your own virtual draw to see if you’re a winner.
Prefer to play in-store? Use the app to scan your paper tickets to see if you’re a lucky winner. Plus, easily save your favourite numbers to play online or in-store.

Play all our games:
- Buy Lotto, Powerball and Strike tickets – right up until the draw closes.
- Play more than 30 Instant Kiwi Online games and be in to win prizes instantly.
- Play Keno or Bullseye for the chance to win every day.

Check if you’re a winner:
- Check your online ticket in your own exciting virtual draw.
- Scan your paper tickets or scratchies you’ve bought in-store to see if you’re a winner.

Make it your own:
- Set up Touch ID, Face ID or a 4-digit pin for easy login.
- Top up your MyLotto account, view your tickets and withdraw your winnings.
- Use our Play Smart tools to set a spending limit or take a break from games.
- Get jackpot reminders straight to your phone.

Play your numbers:
- Save your favourite numbers to easily play online or in-store.
- Scan paper tickets and save your favourite numbers to play in-store or online.

Responsible gambling:
- Encouraging positive play is at the heart of everything we do. Lotto NZ games are made to be fun to play, and we encourage our players to play a little, and dream a lot.
- We’ve created Play Smart so you can have fun and take control of your play with our handy tools and information. Learn more at lottonzplaysmart.co.nz
- As part of our commitment to responsible play, you must be 18 years old or over to play our Instant Kiwi online games.
- If playing Lotto NZ games has become more than a source of entertainment for you or someone you know, there are resources to help you at safergambling.org.nz or free confidential help, 24/7, at Gambling Helpline NZ on 0800 654 655.

Need-to-knows:
* Only available to players located in New Zealand.
* We recommend iPad users visit our website.

About the Automatic Subscription Renewal:

1. Payment: After you confirm the purchase, the fee will be automatically charged to your Apple iTunes account.

3. If you want to unsubscribe, please open the iPhone "Settings"-->enter "iTunes Store and App Store"-->click "Apple ID", select "View Apple ID", go to the "Account Settings" page, click "Subscribe" choose GoodShort to unsubscribe. if you do not unsubscription at least 24 hours before the end of the subscription period, this subscription will be automatically renewed.

description:
Welcome to ShotShort!

Tired of endless scrolling and not knowing what to watch? ShotShort brings you a whole new way to enjoy entertainment — with high-quality short dramas designed for your busy life. Every episode is just a few minutes long, so you can dive into captivating stories anytime, anywhere, without the long commitment. Whether you’re commuting, on a coffee break, or relaxing before bed, ShotShort makes it easy to fit great storytelling into your day.

A World of Genres at Your Fingertips
From sweet and heartwarming romances to intense revenge thrillers, suspense-packed mysteries, family dramas, and even fantasy adventures — ShotShort has something for every mood. Our content library is always growing, giving you endless stories to explore. Love dramatic CEO romances, gripping werewolf tales, or emotional urban dramas? We’ve got it all, ready for you in cinematic HD quality.

Fresh Stories, Non-Stop
We add new episodes and series every week, so your watchlist will never run dry. Our intelligent recommendation system learns your tastes and guides you to your next favorite drama effortlessly — no more endless scrolling, just instant entertainment you’ll actually enjoy.

Immersive Viewing, Anywhere
Crystal-Clear HD Quality – Beautiful visuals and professional production bring every story to life.
Multilingual Subtitles – Enjoy dramas from around the world, in your language.
Sleek & Easy Navigation – Find what you want quickly, with an interface designed for effortless browsing.

Free to Enjoy, Your Way
ShotShort is completely free to watch, supported by ads so everyone can access our stories. Want an even smoother experience? An optional small subscription lets you remove ads entirely and watch without interruptions.

Why Choose ShotShort?
- Episodes just minutes long — perfect for on-the-go viewing
- New stories added weekly to keep things fresh
- Smart recommendations tailored to your interests
- Genres for every taste, from romance to fantasy
- Watch anytime, anywhere — all in stunning HD
Step into a world where big drama fits into small moments. With ShotShort, you’ll always have a new story waiting for you.

Download ShotShort today and start your next binge-worthy adventure — no matter how little time you have.

About Subscriptions
Auto-renewing subscription instructions:
1. Payment: The purchase will be charged to your iTunes account.
2. Renewal: Your Apple iTunes account will be charged within 24 hours before the subscription expires, extending your access for another cycle upon successful payment.
3. Cancellation: To cancel auto-renewal, disable the function in your iTunes/Apple ID settings at least 24 hours before the current subscription ends. If canceled within the last 24 hours, a renewal fee may still apply.
4. For more information, please see: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
Privacy Policy: https://www.mediaradiance.com/privacy.html
Application Terms of Service: https://www.mediaradiance.com/service_clause.html
Renewal: https://www.mediaradiance.com/renewal_agreement/
If you have any questions, email us contact@mediaradiance.com~

Famefy offers a fully AI-powered experience where every audience member, comment, and reaction is generated by artificial intelligence. There are no real viewers involved.
Step into the world of AI-driven live streams and connect with a virtual audience that interacts in real time. Whether you're building confidence, rehearsing a performance, or simply 
having fun, Famefy helps you feel like a true star with lifelike engagement designed to match your energy and style.

Key Features

AI-Powered Audience: Interact with responsive virtual fans that mirror the excitement of a real online crowd.
Personalized Fan Reactions: Your AI audience adapts to your content over time, creating a more engaging and tailored experience with every session.
Smart Environment and Voice Analysis: Your tone, pace, and surroundings influence how your audience responds, thanks to intelligent real-time analysis.
Lifelike Interactions: Enjoy realistic comments, cheers, and reactions that feel just like going live—only without any real users.

Step into the Spotlight

Famefy is your personal space to experience the energy of going live in front of thousands. Whether you’re practicing public speaking, testing creative ideas, or exploring what it’s like to entertain an audience, Famefy brings your moment to life through advanced AI-generated engagement.

Disclaimer

Famefy is designed for entertainment and educational purposes only. All audience activity is created by artificial intelligence. There are no real users, viewers, or live broadcasts. Famefy does not collect or store personal data.

* Reload your Powercards and skip the queues

ThreeNow has been updated and upgraded! As always, you can find your favourite TV shows from Three, Rush, eden, Bravo and HGTV - as well as ThreeNow exclusive shows that you won't find on any other streaming service in New Zealand.  And now, we also offer brand new channels, including Reality, True Crime, Paranormal and others, all for free! 

With the ThreeNow app you have access to thousands of hours of Live and On-Demand content to stream on your iPhone or iPad.  Download the app and create an account to start streaming! 

- Continue watching where you left off or carry on watching on another  device. Add a show to your Watchlist to watch later.  
- Easily find the shows you love - simply search by show or your favourite category - or be inspired by one of our curated collections.  

Completely free to watch, ThreeNow offers the best in reality, comedy, drama, lifestyle, entertainment, news and documentaries from New Zealand and around the world.

Sky Go goes with you. It’s free to download for Sky customers and is the perfect companion to your Sky box. Download the app and watch LIVE TV and On Demand on any device.
 
Key features:
 
- Watch all your favourite TV shows anytime, anywhere in NZ
- Cast Sky to your TV and watch on your big screen
- Download to go, so you can watch later, without using your data
- Browse the TV guide to find out what’s on, set reminders and remote record
- Record to watch later with My Sky.
 
 
The Sky Go App is supported on iOS Phones and Tablets. You can register to watch Sky Go on five devices per Sky account and you can watch on one device at a time. Free for Sky customers with a Sky box in their home.


SKY GO supports Chromecast. We recommend Gen 3 or Ultra. We frequently have tens of thousands of customers using Chromecast. See the following article for more help
https://help.sky.co.nz/s/article/Chromecast-Issues-on-Sky-Go 


For more information visit the Sky Go website www.skygo.co.nz/support

With the free Steam Mobile App, you can take Steam with you anywhere. Buy PC games and get the latest game and community news - while protecting your Steam account.

Shop Steam
Browse the Steam catalog of PC games from your phone. Never miss a sale again.

Steam Guard
Protect your Steam account and make sign in faster with two-factor authentication.
• Two-factor authentication to ensure you’re the only one with access to your account
• QR code sign in - Scan a QR code to sign into Steam instead of entering a password or…
• Sign in confirmation - Confirm your regular Steam sign ins with simple “approve” or “deny”

Library & Remote downloads
The new Library view makes it easy to view game content, discussions, guides, support, and more. Plus you can manage game downloads and updates to your PC from your phone.

Trade and Market Confirmations
Speed up item trades and sales by using your phone to confirm them.

Plus
• A personalized News feed based on your Library with the latest news, events, and content updates direct from publishers and game developers.
• Customizable Steam notifications: wishlist, sales, comments, trades, discussions, friend requests, and more.
• Access to the entire Steam Community - discussions, groups, guides, Market, Workshop, broadcasts, and more.
• Access to your friends, friend activity, groups, screenshots, inventory, wallet, and more.
• Authorized Devices - Manage access to the devices your account has signed in
• An improved Store browsing experience for mobile screens
• Support for using multiple Steam accounts in the app
• Support for customizing your app's main tabs
